original_text:
In arrogance the wicked hotly pursue the poor;
    let them be caught in the schemes that they have devised.
korean_text: 악한 자가 교만하여 가련한 자를 심히 압박하오니 그들이 자기가 베푼 꾀에 빠지게 하소서

sentences.original_text: In arrogance the wicked hotly pursue the poor;
sentences.korean_translation: 오만하게 악인들은 가난한 자들을 맹렬히 쫓습니다.

sentences.original_text: in the schemes that they have devised.
